info.title: common-xapi-services
info.description: The API supports the ability to send requests to create a new trouble ticket specifying the nature and severity of the trouble or issue as well as all necessary related information.

parameters.name: ORIGIN
parameters.description: Parameter that allows the origin of the request to be identified

parameters.name: CUSTOMER_ID
parameters.description: Customer identification number can be ID card or tax ID number

parameters.name: CUSTOMER_ID_TYPE
parameters.description: Type of customer identification document

parameters.name: FILTERS
parameters.description: String used to apply filters to the query (follow example), separate the filter type and its value with a colon, and separate the number of filters with a semicolon.

parameters.name: CUN
parameters.description: CUN number of the PQR

parameters.name: PQR_ID
parameters.description: CUN number of the PQR

parameters.name: BILLING_ACCOUNT
parameters.description: Billing account number to be consulted

parameters.name: PHONE
parameters.description: Connection number to be consulted

parameters.name: LIMIT
parameters.description: Limit on orders to display

parameters.name: OFFSET
parameters.description: used to organize information and establish a logical order

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: System of origin of the request.

parameters.name: X-CORRELATION-ID
parameters.description: Optional Correlation ID to be overwritten when sent the request as a transaction identifier

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Destination of the request.

parameters.name: systemId
parameters.description: Auditing logs system identifier. Used for internal communication.

parameters.name: processName
parameters.description: Auditing logs process name. Used for internal communication

characteristics.name: DescripcionTipologia
characteristics.value: Información con la  gestión y requisitos del trámite de  cancelación de los servicios suscritos

characteristics.name: AccionSeguirTipologia
characteristics.value: Entregar la información de requisitos o estado del trámite, según el caso. Si la orden presenta alguna novedad, reingresar o escalar.

pqrs.description:
NOMBRE: CAROLINA
CEDULA: 52530339
TEL: 3124853341  
CORREO: condorcas@hotmail.com  
DIRRECION: CL 74C SUR 12 20
LINEA: SR-30593591 	
CUENTA: 12054363574
MOTIVO: DESEA CANCELAR Y BA  A REALIZAR LA CARTA PARA QUE NO LE COBREN EL SERVICIO POR FALLA MASIVA YA QUE AL DIA DE HOY AUN NO SE LE SOLUCIONA LA FALLA
pqrs.solution: CLIENTE INDIDICA QUE SE VA  HACERCAR A UN PUNTO HACER EL TRAMITE

message.message: Required query parameter document not specified

message.example: Required query parameter document not specified

Authorization.description:
Used to send a valid OAuth 2 access token. Do not use
with the "access_token" query string parameter.

access_token.description:
Used to send a valid OAuth 2 access token. Do not use together with
the "Authorization" header

401.description:
Bad or expired token. This can happen if the user or Dropbox
revoked or expired an access token. To fix, you should re-
authenticate the user.

403.description:
Bad OAuth request (wrong consumer key, bad nonce, expired
timestamp...). Unfortunately, re-authenticating the user won't help here.
